user_prompt: Create comprehensive Prayer Request Manager Agent testing integration with UI components. This agent replaces Prayer Request Management automation and integrates with app/communicationhub/page.tsx MessageQueueItem component and app/churchdashboard/page.tsx Prayer request alerts. Functions include: Request classification (Urgent/Health/Family/Spiritual/Other), Automated pastor assignment, Follow-up scheduling, Prayer chain coordination, Status tracking and updates. Reference the existing attendance-agent-testing-integration spec structure and AgentTestingSection pattern for consistency. Create testing sections in both Communication Hub and Church Dashboard pages.
